title: what if we reverted ignite damage buff but gave it true sight
body:
that way stealth could be dealt with better for champ who can no longer just drop a pink, but at the cost of a summoner spell and it needing to be cast BEFORE they turn invisible anyways.

ignite has always been a spell cast to secure kills, this would better "secure" the kill, and also make it less oppressive

> [{quoted}](name=A Bad Akali,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Pc76kA6c,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-10-17T16:27:11.401+0000)

Except her shroud ignores true sight abilities. People would stop complaining about her shroud if it didn’t immediately drop all tower threat.
Tower threat doesn't stop most assassins, so why should it stop this one?
It doesn't ignore them. She's still revealed in the form of a bright white silhouette, she just isn't targetable. It's a big target for skillshots and aoe.
Its still up too long for its effective half second down time maybe 1.5 seconds max when akali gets cdr. but it not dropping tower agro would be nice

This is very hyperbolic, Akali doesn't do well stacking CDR no matter how much it may seem she does from an outward perspective, and even if she did it's at a 6.6s cd from 11 seconds when maxed, and the cd starts after her shroud dissipates.

She falls off late hard anyway, so the shorter cooldown helps her actually survive lategame teamfights. I'm not saying it's a super long cd, but it isn't as short as you're saying either.

except that you seem to be ignoring the part where the time it sticks around is extended for every time akali fades back into it so after every q and auto and e and auto its gonna be extended. not to mention that you getting at least 20% cdr to not get instagibed yourself {{item:3102}} {{item:3157}} which also allows for akali to dps with her q and e.

Riot wouldnt make a change like that because it would only work against specific champions. We already stopped cleanse from removing suppression specifically because you always took it against suppression champions so no reason to make ignite specifically counter stealth especially after riot made their changes with stealth having no counter in mind.

I like your idea!

(Though I think adding 0.25 sec duration back to exhaust would decrease ignite usage anyway)
